Name: Felix the Irilyan
Content:
Felix is a proud soldier of Meyram, having risen to become a respected officer in his late twenties. He is a devout follower of the Sun Goddess and holds her ideals of  life, justice, and eager creation to be the foundations of a good world.

In an attempt to save the scientist Fabia, Felix got stuck in one of the compound's stasis chambers. He is about to be awoken by the group.
